name: Design System Architecture
title: Design System Architecture
task: Outline the high-level architecture for a new software system.
goal: Establish a strong architectural foundation for the system.
context: At the start of a new project or major system update.
details: Include system components, relationships, and technologies.

name: Select Technology Stack
title: Select Technology Stack
task: Recommend a technology stack for a scalable web application and justify your choices.
goal: Ensure the technology stack supports scalability and maintainability.
context: During the project initiation or technology evaluation phase.
details: Include criteria for selection and potential alternatives.

name: Create Data Flow Diagram
title: Create Data Flow Diagram
task: Draw and explain a data flow diagram for a core business process.
goal: Visualize and understand data movement and transformation.
details: Include data sources, destinations, and storage.

name: Define Integration Points
title: Define Integration Points
task: List and describe integration points with external systems.
goal: Ensure seamless integration with external systems and services.
details: Include protocols, data formats, and security considerations.

name: Establish Coding Standards
title: Establish Coding Standards
task: Set coding standards and architectural guidelines for the development team.
goal: Maintain code quality and consistency across the project.
context: At the beginning of a project and during onboarding.
details: Include language-specific guidelines and best practices.

name: Review System Scalability
title: Review System Scalability
task: Assess the scalability of the current system and suggest improvements.
goal: Ensure the system can handle increased load and growth.
context: During system evaluation and capacity planning.
details: Include scalability metrics and testing results.

name: Security Architecture
title: Security Architecture
task: Design a security architecture for a cloud-based application.
goal: Protect the application and data from security threats.
context: During system design and threat modeling.
details: Include security controls, monitoring, and response strategies.

name: Performance Optimization
title: Performance Optimization
task: Identify performance bottlenecks and propose optimization strategies.
context: During system tuning and optimization phases.
details: Include profiling results and recommended optimizations.

name: Document Architectural Decisions
title: Document Architectural Decisions
task: Document key architectural decisions and their rationale.
goal: Provide a clear record of architectural choices and reasons.
context: After major design sessions or decisions.
details: Include decision logs and impact assessments.

name: Microservices Design
title: Microservices Design
task: Design a microservices architecture for a large-scale system.
goal: Enable scalability and flexibility through microservices.
details: Include service boundaries, communication methods, and data management.

name: Legacy System Migration
title: Legacy System Migration
task: Plan the migration of a legacy system to a modern platform.
goal: Ensure a smooth and efficient migration with minimal disruption.
details: Include migration strategy, tools, and risk management.

name: Disaster Recovery Planning
title: Disaster Recovery Planning
task: Create a disaster recovery plan for mission-critical applications.
goal: Ensure business continuity in case of disasters.
context: During risk management and contingency planning.
details: Include recovery strategies, resources, and testing procedures.
